class.name: MediaPipeImageEmbedder
class.description: MediaPipe vision task for performing embedding extraction on the given image.

method.name: embed
method.description: Performs image embedding extraction on [param image]. Only use this method when the task is initialized with [constant MediaPipeVisionTask.RUNNING_MODE_IMAGE].

method.name: embed_async
method.description: Sends [param image] to perform image embedding extraction. Only use this method when the task is initialized with [constant MediaPipeVisionTask.RUNNING_MODE_LIVE_STREAM].

method.name: embed_video
method.description: Performs image embedding extraction on video frame [param image]. Only use this method when the task is initialized with [constant MediaPipeVisionTask.RUNNING_MODE_VIDEO].

signal.name: result_callback
signal.description: Emitted when image embedder initialized with [constant MediaPipeVisionTask.RUNNING_MODE_LIVE_STREAM] returns image embedding result.
